Finding a rule from a table using addition and subtraction - Help on math

\begin{aligned}\n&9\\\n&0\\\n&\begin{array}{|c|c|c|c|}\n\hline x & 1 & 2 & 3 \\\n\hline f(x) & 6 & 7 & 8 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}\\\n&10\n\end{aligned}[imath]\hline x & 1 & 2 & 3 [/imath] [imath]\hline f(x) & 6 & 7 & 8 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
